Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: amazoner "amazoner"
Reviews.Content: camera works perfectly, yet having a difficult time hooking up the microphone...no directions or instruction, no specific on what sort of cable to use.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD image sensor
Small size, discreet installation
600 TV Lines, 0.002 lux; Build in f 3.6mm Lens
Digital automatic backlight compensation; Auto white balance
Package included: 8 x dome cameras, 2 x 4 channel 12V DC power supply and 8 x security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 x Built-in 1/3'' Sony Effio CCD Dome Security Cameras 600TVL Wide Angle View Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with 2 of 4 Channel Power Supplies and Security Warning Stickers CC5
